abstract: Lester Bowler Jr is executed for 1983 fatal shootings of four men at airplane hangar near Sherman, Tex.
lead_paragraph: Lester Bower Jr., 67, who was convicted of the 1983 fatal shootings of four men at an airplane hangar on a ranch near Sherman, Tex., was executed by lethal injection on Wednesday.

headline.main: Texas: Killer of Four Men Is Executed
headline.print_headline: Texas: Killer of Four Men Is Executed

snippet: Lester Bower Jr., 67, who was convicted of the 1983 fatal shootings of four men at an airplane hangar on a ranch near Sherman, Tex., was executed by lethal injection on Wednesday.
